name: lib/document.js

properties.name: filepath
properties.description: path to file to be uploaded

name: create
description:
Uploads a file and creates a document.
This endpoint accepts .pdf, .doc, .docx, .odt, .rtf, .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .bmp, .xml, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx file types

name: DocumentFieldExtractParams
description: Upload document with field extract payload

properties.name: filepath
properties.description: path to file to be uploaded

name: DocumentFieldExtractResponse
description: Upload document with field extract response data

name: fieldextract
description:
Uploads a file that contains SignNow Document Field Tags.
This endpoint only accepts .pdf (you may convert the document from .doc or .docx to .pdf)

params.name: data
params.description: upload document with field extract payload

name: DocumentViewResponse
description: Document view response of specific document

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: id of user that uploaded document

properties.name: page_count
properties.description: amount of pages in the document

properties.name: original_filename
properties.description: original filename with document format (.pdf, .doc, etc...)

properties.name: origin_document_id
properties.description: an id of original document (if document is a copy)

properties.name: template
properties.description: is document a template or not

properties.name: thumbnail
properties.description: thumbnail urls with different sizes (small, medium, large)

properties.name: radiobuttons
properties.description: checked radiobuttons after document was signed

properties.name: field_validators
properties.description: validation rules for fields (date fields, payment fields etc.)

properties.name: pages
properties.description: list of document pages with page sources and page size.

params.name: data
params.description: view document with field extract payload

properties.name: custom_defined_option
properties.description: if 'true' user can change values, if 'false' user can only read

properties.name: term
properties.description: name of field which will participate in calculation formula

properties.name: term
properties.description: a part of formula parsed into tree

properties.name: custom_defined_option
properties.description: if 'true' user can change values, if 'false' user can only read

name: update
description:
Updates an existing document.
Adds fields (signature, text, initials, checkbox, radiobutton group, calculated) and elements (signature, text, check).
Every call of this method will add only specified fields into document.
Old fields will be removed

name: download
description: Downloads document with embedded fields and elements

properties.name: role_id
properties.description: role unique id (can be discovered in document details)

properties.name: to
properties.description: array of signers or email of single signer

properties.name: cc
properties.description: array with emails of copy receivers

properties.name: email
properties.description: ability to disable invitation by email. to disabale email assign value 'disable'

name: DocumentFieldInviteResponse
description: Create document field invite response data

name: DocumentFreeformInviteResponse
description: Create document free form invite response data

name: invite
description:
Creates an invite to sign a document.
You can create a simple free form invite(s) or a role-based invite(s).

name: remove
description: Removes a specified document from folder

name: lib/index.js

properties.name: production
properties.description: production/eval API flag. If false uses eval

name: lib/oauth2.js

properties.name: res.expires_in
properties.description: time in seconds for which the token was issued

name: requestToken
description: Request access token for a user

properties.name: res.expires_in
properties.description: time in seconds for which the token was issued

name: lib/template.js

properties.name: removeOriginalDocument
properties.description: if true original document will be removed

name: create
description:
Creates a template by copying an existing unfulfilled and not requested for sign document.
By default original document is not removed after template creation. To remove original document set `removeOriginalDocument` option to `true`.

name: duplicate
description:
Creates a new document by copying a template.
If a name is not supplied then document name will be set to the original template's name by default.

name: TemplateInviteResponse
description: Create invite with template response data

name: invite
description:
Creates an invite to sign a template.
You can create a simple free form invite(s) or a role-based invite(s).
The method copies a template into document and creates an invite using created document.

name: lib/user.js

properties.name: is_logged_in
properties.description: user is logged in or not

types: {start_date: string, end_date: string, start_timestamp: number, end_timestamp: number}
properties.name: billing_period
companies
properties.description: companies where user is a member of

properties.name: teams
properties.description: teams where user is a member of

properties.name: organization_settings
properties.description: organization specific settings where user is a member of
